page.title: 11Toll Bar School Rhymes.
page.content:
{These are three rhymes that the {chidren sing at Toll Bar School.
1) Nebuchadnezzar the King of the Jews Bought his wife a pair of shoes. When the shoes began to wear Nebuchadnezzar began to swear. When the swear began to stop Nebuchadnezzar bought a shop. When the shop began to sell Nebuchadnezzar bought a bell. When the bell began to ring Nebuchadnezzar began to sing. 2){Senorita touch the ground, {Senorita twirl a round, {Senorita do the kicks, {Senorita do the splits. 3) Mrs Brown went to town, With her knickers upside down. Saw a ghost eating toast, Half way up the lamppost.
